landing.title: Welcome to the first decentralized payment app.
landing.description: In QuaiPay, you own what's yours. QuaiPay is the first payments app where you are the only person in control of your assets.
landing.loginButton: Already have an account? Click here to login.

wallet.description: Wallet is a place where you can store your money.

keychainBottomSheet.title: Found data from previous session on your phone!
keychainBottomSheet.description:
For some reason you were not properly logged out of your account in your device. Thus, information about your account persisted in your phone's secure inner storage.
If you agree to it, we can use it to setup your account again.
keychainBottomSheet.continueButton: Login using phone's secure storage info
keychainBottomSheet.dismissButton: Dismiss and login with another method
